results.title: Nepal Declares Emergency Over Dengue Outbreak
results.description: Authorities in Nepal have declared a health emergency after a sharp rise in dengue cases across the country.

results.title: Free Health Camps Set Up in Karnali Province
results.description: Local government has launched free health camps for villagers in remote districts of Karnali.

results.title: Nepal's Fight Against Malnutrition in Children
results.description: Programs to reduce malnutrition among children are being rolled out with UN and WHO support.

results.title: Air Pollution Worsens Respiratory Issues in Kathmandu
results.description: Hospitals in Kathmandu report a spike in respiratory illnesses due to increasing pollution levels.

results.title: National Immunization Week Sees Surge in Participation
results.description: Thousands of children across Nepal received free vaccines during the National Immunization Week.

results.title: WHO Supports Nepal in TB Eradication Drive
results.description: World Health Organization partners with Nepal to eliminate tuberculosis by 2030.

results.title: Mental Health Awareness Campaign Launched Nationwide
results.description: Nepal initiates a nationwide awareness campaign to tackle mental health stigma.

results.title: Remote Clinics in Mustang Get Solar-Powered Equipment
results.description: Solar panels are being used to power essential medical equipment in remote Himalayan clinics.

results.title: Kathmandu Hospital Introduces Robotic Surgery for Cancer Treatment
results.description: A new robotic surgical unit has been launched to enhance cancer treatment precision in Nepal.
